overview: Richard Benarous, MD PhD, CSO & Founder - Formerly Director of the Department of Infectious Diseases at Institut Cochin (Paris), visiting Professor at MIT (Boston), co-founder of Hybrigenics SA in 1998 and Cytomics Systems SA in 2001. Richard Benarous is an internationally recognized leader in Molecular Virology in the field of host-virus interactions. He is the author of more than 100 publications in international major Molecular Biology and Virology journals. Richard Benarous is in charge of the research and discovery/development operations at CellVir.
